title: Is there any difference between rr and ec
content:
let be teaching,placements, degree(certification)  research facilities. tech clubs and all other academic oriented stuffs other than fests.

Most important are the teachers bad in ec and better in rr?

comments.body:
Rr = ec in placements

Ec > rr in quality of events

Rr > ec in terms of infra

Rr is more preferred by students than ec (coz of connectivity and subjective reasons)
well what about teaching? like professors and facilities and research clubs
Seniors should answer..
I saw somewhere that rr has better placements stats than ec I think rr cse avg was 14.5L this year whereas ec cse avg was 12.8L maybe it's cuz the peer group is better at rr
Seniors should answer..

it could be because of peer grp, considering cutoffs

I'm asking about professors.
Where did u find campus specific placement data bro, i struggled to find their overall placement data here lmao
Please read the FAQs before posting duplicate questions
In pes campus they had put in a board
In colleges most of it is self study ig

In a board outside pes placement office the placement stats for 2024 were like
Cse pes rr avg was 15lpa
Cse pes ec avg was 12lpa
Overall was 13.8 lpa
